element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text: This algorithm eliminates small polygons in a raster layer (i.e. small groups of contiguous cells with a common value). Cells in any of those small zones will be given the no-data value

element.name: MINAREA
element.text: Minimum area (in cells). All cells that belong to a zone with less that this number of cells will be eliminated (substituted by cells with no-data values)

element.name: RESULT
element.text: The resulting layer with no-data values in those cells belonging to cell clumps smaller than the selected minimum area.
